DOC.brief_summary: This study compare cataract patient phacoemulsification . Evaluations perform 1 3 month follow cataract surgery , include measurement tear film lipid layer thickness , tear film break time , Schirmer test , corneal conjunctival fluorescein staining , examination lid margin meibomian gland , Ocular Surface Disease Index .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Tear Film Lipid Layer Thickness Change After Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: cataract patient lens opacity classification high grade III desire spectacle independence distance near vision previous ocular surgery trauma presence corneal opacity , fundus abnormality , glaucoma , uveitis , amblyopia , systemic disease , posterior capsule rupture cataract surgery
